pgp.title: wanna talk securely?
pgp.subtitle: Feel free to use my PGP key when emailing me...

about.title: a lover of tech
about.info:
Hi, I’m a full stack software developer in Winnipeg, MB and I really like technology.

I enjoy everything from front end web and mobile development with React and React Native, to backend API's running Rails, ExpressJS. I have experience with a variety of software stacks, and am enjoying playing with cloud solutions like Google Cloud Platform and Firebase. Over the years I have developed a deep passion for software development and have applied myself in both theoretical and practical applications.

I have a passion for life, learning, and technology.

discover.title: a lover of exploration
discover.subtitle: I believe in research & discovery
discover.intro: I don't just write code, I aim to write accessible code. Software development is my never ending journey. Therefore, I advocate for clean code, agile development, and innovative technologies to provide a modern, fast, and accessible product.
discover.summary: I don't wait for the future. I make it. Swipe left to learn more about where I have worked and what I do.

legible.title: legible media inc.
legible.description: I am currently doing really cool things on the backend at Legible.

transit.title: winnipeg transit
transit.description:
Many people in the world rely on public transit.

At Winnipeg Transit, my focus is on making schedule information accessible through a variety of tools available to the public.

I function as a programmer / analyst on the Public Facing Apps team. I have a strong passion for emerging technologies, so I enjoy learning and testing new tools with my team.

dawei.title: dawei info. solutions
dawei.description:
Why not do what you love?

Dawei Information Solutions made having a web presence easy for everyone.

I started Dawei Information Solutions to help reduce the entry barrier for small to medium sized businesses and provide an easy, cost effective way to have websites and general IT support.

I've moved on from Dawei recently, and am now working full-time at Winnipeg Transit

enigma.title: enigma networks
enigma.description:
I love working with small businesses.

Enigma Networks was a small IT shop in Winnipeg that provided small businesses with IT services such as custom web based software applications.

I started using PHP to develop and deploy production ready solutions for a variety of projects from online stores, to reservation and inventory management systems for local businesses.

This is where I started to delve into the vast world of NodeJS and Angular.

contact.title: a lover of communication
contact.subtitle: So you'd like to get in touch.
contact.intro: To save us both time, I've put together a brief guide to help you find the best methods to contact me.
contact.email: You should contact me by email if:
contact.social: You should contact me by social media if:

contact.history: You'd like a more detailed career history or have other business questions
contact.feedback: You have any other feedback related to this site
contact.send_an_email: If this fits your enquiry, send an email to
contact.know_more_about_me: You want to know more about me
contact.if_you_want: , if you're into that sort of thing...
